description: THE VILLAGE AT SEQUOIA RIDGE! Coveted END-UNIT in a gated community. Features A/C, double garage + extra-long driveway for 3rd car. Tastefully updated w/ NEW FLOORS, FRESH PAINT & RENOVATED Kitchen (granite/SS). Upstairs boasts a Primary suite w/ VIEWS & luxe ensuite. The finished lower level offers VERSATILITY: A spacious Rec Room currently utilized as a 5th BDRM, plus a private 4th BDRM (windowless) - perfect for a media room, gym, or quiet office. Private patio/garden. Near golf, transit & top schools (Coyote Creek/Fleetwood Park).
